title: Is civilization an error of nature? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is civilization an error of nature? Well, are civilizations a product of “nature” to begin with? Aren’t they a human-made “thing” that have more to do with the development of societies than any form of natural development or concept? Also, are they an actual error, a “glitch in the matrix”, or did we just built some of them by imposing “wrong” — and I use the word loosely — social and cultural norms? See? It runs deeper than it might look like… But, by definition, it has nothing to do with “nature”.
